verses.verse: <S%G1096><s%> And It Came To Pass <S%G1161><s%> On <S%G1722><s%> Sabbath The <S%G4521><s%> Second First <S%G1207><s%> Passed Along <S%G1279><s%> He <S%G846><s%> Through <S%G1223><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Corn Fields; <S%G4702><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Were Plucking <S%G5089><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3101><s%> His Disciples <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Ears, <S%G4719><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Were Eating, <S%G2068><s%> Rubbing Them <S%G5597><s%> In The <S%G3588><s%> Hands. <S%G5495><s%>

<S%G5100><s%> But Some <S%G1161><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> , To Them, <S%G846><s%> Why <S%G5101><s%> Do Ye <S%G4160><s%> That Which <S%G3739><s%> <S%G3756><s%> It Is Not Lawful <S%G1832><s%> To Do <S%G4160><s%> On <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sabbaths? <S%G4521><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Answering <S%G611><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> Not Even <S%G3761><s%> This <S%G5124><s%> Did Ye Read, <S%G314><s%> That Which <S%G3739><s%> Did <S%G4160><s%> , David, <S%G1138><s%> When <S%G3698><s%> He Hungered, <S%G3983><s%> Himself <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Those Who <S%G3588><s%> ' With <S%G3326><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Were? <S%G5607><s%>

How <S%G5613><s%> He Entered <S%G1525><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> House <S%G3624><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God, <S%G2316><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Loaves <S%G740><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Presentation <S%G4286><s%> Took, <S%G2983><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Ate, <S%G5315><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Gave <S%G1325><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> To Those <S%G3588><s%> ' With <S%G3326><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> <S%G3756><s%> It Is Not Lawful <S%G1832><s%> <S%G5315><s%> To Eat <S%G1487><s%> Except <S%G3361><s%> Only <S%G3441><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Priests? <S%G2409><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He Said <S%G3004><s%> <S%G846><s%> To Them, <S%G3754><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Man <S%G444><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Sabbath. <S%G4521><s%>

<S%G1096><s%> And It Came To Pass <S%G1161><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> On <S%G1722><s%> Another <S%G2087><s%> Sabbath <S%G4521><s%> Entered <S%G1525><s%> He <S%G846><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Synagogue <S%G4864><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Taught; <S%G1321><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> There Was <S%G2258><s%> There <S%G1563><s%> A Man, <S%G444><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5495><s%> His Hand <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Right <S%G1188><s%> Was <S%G2258><s%> Withered. <S%G3584><s%>

<S%G3906><s%> And Were Watching <S%G1161><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Scribes <S%G1122><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Pharisees, <S%G5330><s%> Whether <S%G1487><s%> On <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sabbath <S%G4521><s%> He Will Heal, <S%G2323><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> They Might Find <S%G2147><s%> An Accusation Against <S%G2724><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G846><s%> But He <S%G1161><s%> Knew <S%G1492><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1261><s%> Their Reasonings, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Man <S%G444><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Withered <S%G3584><s%> Had <S%G2192><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Hand, <S%G5495><s%> Arise, <S%G1453><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Stand <S%G2476><s%> In <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Midst. <S%G3319><s%> <S%G3588><s%> And He <S%G1161><s%> Having Risen Up <S%G450><s%> Stood. <S%G2476><s%>

Said <S%G2036><s%> Then <S%G3767><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Them, <S%G846><s%> I Will Ask <S%G1905><s%> You, <S%G5209><s%> Whether <S%G5101><s%> It Is Lawful <S%G1832><s%> On The <S%G3588><s%> , Sabbaths <S%G4521><s%> To Do Good <S%G15><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> To Do Evil? <S%G2554><s%> Life <S%G5590><s%> To Save <S%G4982><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> To Destroy? <S%G622><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Looked Around On <S%G4017><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> He Said <S%G2036><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> , Man, <S%G444><s%> Stretch Out <S%G1614><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5495><s%> Thy Hand. <S%G4675><s%> <S%G3588><s%> And He <S%G1161><s%> Did <S%G4160><s%> So, <S%G3779><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Was Restored <S%G600><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5495><s%> His Hand <S%G846><s%> Sound <S%G5199><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Other. <S%G243><s%>

<S%G846><s%> But They <S%G1161><s%> Were Filled <S%G4130><s%> With Madness, <S%G454><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Consulted <S%G1255><s%> With <S%G4314><s%> One Another As To <S%G240><s%> <S%G5101><s%> What <S%G302><s%> They Should Do <S%G4160><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>

<S%G1096><s%> And It Came To Pass <S%G1161><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2250><s%> Those Days <S%G3778><s%> He Went Out <S%G1831><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Mountain <S%G3735><s%> To Pray, <S%G4336><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He Was <S%G2258><s%> Spending The Night <S%G1273><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Prayer <S%G4335><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God. <S%G2316><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> When <S%G3753><s%> It Became <S%G1096><s%> Day <S%G2250><s%> He Called To Him <S%G4377><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3101><s%> His Disciples, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Chose Out <S%G1586><s%> ' From <S%G575><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> Twelve, <S%G1427><s%> Whom <S%G3739><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Apostles <S%G652><s%> He Named : <S%G3687><s%>

Simon <S%G4613><s%> Whom <S%G3739><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> He Named <S%G3687><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Andrew <S%G406><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G80><s%> His Brother, <S%G846><s%> James <S%G2385><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> John, <S%G2491><s%> Philip <S%G5376><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Bartholomew, <S%G918><s%>

Matthew <S%G3156><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Thomas, <S%G2381><s%> James <S%G2385><s%> The Son <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Alphaeus <S%G256><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Simon <S%G4613><s%> Who Was <S%G3588><s%> Called <S%G2564><s%> Zealot, <S%G2207><s%>

Judas Brother <S%G2455><s%> Of James, <S%G2385><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Judas <S%G2455><s%> , Iscariot, <S%G2469><s%> Who <S%G3739><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Became The <S%G1096><s%> Betrayer. <S%G4273><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Descending <S%G2597><s%> ' With <S%G3326><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> He Stood <S%G2476><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> A Place <S%G5117><s%> Level, <S%G3977><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> A Crowd <S%G3793><s%> Of Disciples <S%G3101><s%> His <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> A Multitude <S%G4128><s%> Great <S%G4183><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> People <S%G2992><s%> From <S%G575><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Judea <S%G2449><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2419><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sea Coast <S%G3882><s%> Of Tyre <S%G5184><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Sidon, <S%G4605><s%> Who <S%G3739><s%> Came <S%G2064><s%> To Hear <S%G191><s%> , Him, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To Be Healed <S%G2390><s%> Of <S%G575><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3554><s%> , Their Diseases, <S%G846><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> Those <S%G3588><s%> Beset <S%G3791><s%> By <S%G5259><s%> Spirits <S%G4151><s%> Unclean, <S%G169><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> They Were Healed. <S%G2323><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Crowd <S%G3793><s%> Sought <S%G2212><s%> To Touch <S%G680><s%> Him; <S%G846><s%> For <S%G3754><s%> Power <S%G1411><s%> ' From <S%G3844><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Went Out <S%G1831><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Healed <S%G2390><s%> All. <S%G3956><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He <S%G846><s%> Lifting Up <S%G1869><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3788><s%> His Eyes <S%G846><s%> Upon <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Disciples <S%G3101><s%> His <S%G846><s%> Said, <S%G3004><s%> Blessed Are <S%G3107><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Poor, <S%G4434><s%> For <S%G3754><s%> Yours <S%G5212><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Kingdom <S%G932><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God. <S%G2316><s%>

Blessed Ye <S%G3107><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Hunger <S%G3983><s%> Now, <S%G3568><s%> For <S%G3754><s%> Ye Shall Be Filled. <S%G5526><s%> Blessed Ye <S%G3107><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Weep <S%G2799><s%> Now, <S%G3568><s%> For <S%G3754><s%> Ye Shall Laugh. <S%G1070><s%>

Blessed <S%G3107><s%> Are Ye <S%G2075><s%> When <S%G3752><s%> Shall Hate <S%G3404><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Men, <S%G444><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> When <S%G3752><s%> They Shall Cut Off <S%G873><s%> You, <S%G5209><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Shall Reproach You, <S%G3679><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Cast Out <S%G1544><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3686><s%> Your Name <S%G5216><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Wicked, <S%G4190><s%> On Account Of <S%G1752><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Man : <S%G444><s%>

Rejoice <S%G5463><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> That <S%G1565><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Day <S%G2250><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Leap For Joy; <S%G4640><s%> , <S%G2400><s%> For Lo, <S%G1063><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3408><s%> Your Reward Is <S%G5216><s%> Great <S%G4183><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Heaven, <S%G3772><s%> According To <S%G2596><s%> These Things <S%G5024><s%> <S%G5023><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> Did <S%G4160><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Prophets <S%G4396><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3962><s%> Their Fathers. <S%G846><s%>

But <S%G4133><s%> Woe <S%G3759><s%> To You <S%G5213><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Rich, <S%G4145><s%> For <S%G3754><s%> Ye Are Receiving <S%G568><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3874><s%> Your Consolation. <S%G5216><s%>

Woe <S%G3759><s%> To You <S%G5213><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Have Been Filled, <S%G1705><s%> For <S%G3754><s%> Ye Shall Hunger. <S%G3983><s%> Woe <S%G3759><s%> , To You <S%G5213><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Laugh <S%G1070><s%> Now, <S%G3568><s%> For <S%G3754><s%> Ye Shall Mourn <S%G3996><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Weep. <S%G2799><s%>

Woe <S%G3759><s%> , To You <S%G5213><s%> When <S%G3752><s%> Well <S%G2573><s%> Of You <S%G5209><s%> Speak <S%G2036><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Men, <S%G444><s%> According To <S%G2596><s%> These Things <S%G5024><s%> <S%G5023><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> Did <S%G4160><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> False Prophets <S%G5578><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3962><s%> Their Fathers. <S%G846><s%>

' But <S%G235><s%> To You <S%G5213><s%> I Say <S%G3004><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Hear, <S%G191><s%> Love <S%G25><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Enemies <S%G2190><s%> Your, <S%G5216><s%> Well <S%G2573><s%> Do <S%G4160><s%> To Those Who <S%G3588><s%> Hate <S%G3404><s%> You, <S%G5209><s%>

Bless <S%G2127><s%> Those Who <S%G3588><s%> Curse <S%G2672><s%> You, <S%G5213><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Pray <S%G4336><s%> For <S%G5228><s%> Those Who <S%G3588><s%> Despitefully Use <S%G1908><s%> You. <S%G5209><s%>

To Him Who <S%G3588><s%> Strikes <S%G5180><s%> Thee <S%G4571><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Cheek, <S%G4600><s%> Offer <S%G3930><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Other; <S%G243><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> From <S%G575><s%> Him Who <S%G3588><s%> Takes Away <S%G142><s%> Thy <S%G4675><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Cloak, <S%G2440><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5509><s%> Tunic <S%G3361><s%> Do Not Forbid. <S%G2967><s%>

To Every One <S%G3956><s%> And <S%G1161><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Asks <S%G154><s%> Thee, <S%G4571><s%> Give; <S%G1325><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> From <S%G575><s%> Him Who <S%G3588><s%> Takes Away <S%G142><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4674><s%> What Is Thine, <S%G3361><s%> Ask It Not Back; <S%G523><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> According As <S%G2531><s%> Ye Desire <S%G2309><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Should Do <S%G4160><s%> To You <S%G5213><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Men, <S%G444><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Ye <S%G5210><s%> Do <S%G4160><s%> To Them <S%G846><s%> In Like Manner. <S%G3668><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> Ye Love <S%G25><s%> Those Who <S%G3588><s%> Love <S%G25><s%> You, <S%G5209><s%> What <S%G4169><s%> To You <S%G5213><s%> Thank <S%G5485><s%> Is It? <S%G2076><s%> <S%G2532><s%> For Even <S%G1063><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Sinners <S%G268><s%> Those Who <S%G3588><s%> Love <S%G25><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> Love. <S%G25><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> Ye Do Good <S%G15><s%> To Those Who <S%G3588><s%> Do Good To <S%G15><s%> You, <S%G5209><s%> What <S%G4169><s%> To You <S%G5213><s%> Thank <S%G5485><s%> Is It? <S%G2076><s%> Even <S%G2532><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Sinners <S%G268><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Same <S%G846><s%> Do. <S%G4160><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> Ye Lend To Those <S%G1155><s%> ' From <S%G3844><s%> Whom <S%G3739><s%> Ye Hope <S%G1679><s%> , To Receive, <S%G618><s%> What <S%G4169><s%> To You <S%G5213><s%> Thank <S%G5485><s%> Is It? <S%G2076><s%> Even <S%G2532><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Sinners <S%G268><s%> To Sinners <S%G268><s%> Lend, <S%G1155><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> They May Receive <S%G618><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Like. <S%G2470><s%>

But <S%G4133><s%> Love <S%G25><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2190><s%> Your Enemies, <S%G5216><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Do Good, <S%G15><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Lend, <S%G1155><s%> Nothing <S%G3367><s%> Hoping For Again; <S%G560><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Shall Be <S%G2071><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3408><s%> Your Reward <S%G5216><s%> Great, <S%G4183><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Ye Shall Be <S%G2071><s%> Sons <S%G5207><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Highest; <S%G5310><s%> For <S%G3754><s%> He <S%G846><s%> Good <S%G5543><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> To <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Unthankful <S%G884><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Wicked. <S%G4190><s%>

Be Ye <S%G1096><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> Compassionate, <S%G3629><s%> As <S%G2531><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3962><s%> Your Father <S%G5216><s%> Compassionate <S%G3629><s%> Is. <S%G2076><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> And <S%G3361><s%> Judge Not, <S%G2919><s%> That <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756><s%> In No Wise <S%G3361><s%> <S%G2919><s%> Ye Be Judged; <S%G3361><s%> Condemn Not, <S%G2613><s%> That <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756><s%> In No Wise <S%G3361><s%> Ye Be Condemned. <S%G2613><s%> Release, <S%G630><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Ye Shall Be Released. <S%G630><s%>
